sentences.en: A girdle of islands enclosed the lagoon.
A good name is better than a golden girdle.
A quart of milk got sucked up inside my girdle.
sentences.cn: 一夸脱牛奶被我的内衣裤吸乾了.

sentences.en: carefully tended lawns set in a girdle of trees
sentences.cn: 树木环绕、精心修整的草坪

sentences.en: Deformities of the pelvic girdle in females may lead to difficulties in child - birth many years later.
sentences.cn: 妇女骨盆带变形,在以后分娩时会产生困难.

sentences.en: Dressed in nothing but her girdle she bears carnage in her soul.
sentences.cn: 浑身赤裸仅着腰带灵魂备受屠戮.

sentences.en: He walked among the displaced contours of her pectoral girdle.
sentences.cn: 他在她胸肢带骨的变形周线间漫步.

sentences.en: I'll put a girdle round about the earth in forty minutes.
sentences.cn: 我可以在四十分钟内环绕世界一周.

sentences.en: Lashed inside her blooded girdle she is waiting for the rain.
sentences.cn: 她扎紧染血的腰带盼望着大雨降临.

sentences.en: She may be shown wearing a girdle of severed arms.
sentences.cn: 她可能是展示出腰带上的厉害武器.

sentences.en: The area circles the tree and is called a girdle.
sentences.cn: 这个切除区围绕着树,又称为腰带.

sentences.en: the formal garden that girdled the house
sentences.cn: 环绕屋子布置井然的花园

sentences.en: The girdle made Ada look much slimmer.
sentences.cn: 穿了紧身褡艾达看上去苗条多了.

sentences.en: The girl wore a girdle around her gym tunic.
sentences.cn: 这女孩在体操衫外束了一条腰带.

sentences.en: The portion of a cut gem above the girdle.
sentences.cn: 宝面露在镶嵌底板上面的那部分已雕琢过的宝石.

sentences.en: This tissue is found mainly about the shoulder girdle.
sentences.cn: 这种组织主要见于肩胛带周围.

words.tran_cn: [古生]腰带；围绕物；妇女紧身褡
围绕；绕…而行；用带子捆扎

trans.tran_cn: （支持四肢的）带，腰带，环形物，妇女紧身褡
trans.tran_en: a piece of women’s underwear which fits tightly around her stomach, bottom, and  hips  and makes her look thinner

trans.tran_cn: 围绕；绕…而行；用带子捆扎
